data.title: 5 Top Stock Trades for Tuesday: NVDA, TWLO, MA, STMP, S&P 500
data.text: The S&P 500, MasterCard, Nvidia, Stamps.com and Twilio were our top stock trades.That said, here's what the charts are telling us now.

data.title: Why Mastercard's Stock Is Trading Higher Today
data.text: Mastercard (NYSE: MA) shares were trading higher on Monday, The company announced the expansion of its cryptocurrency program making it simpler and faster for partners to bring secure, compliant payment cards to market.

data.title: Mastercard expands cryptocurrency program to allow more firms to issue cards on its network
data.text: Mastercard has signed a deal with Wirex that makes the London-based firm the first "native" cryptocurrency platform to gain principal membership.

data.title: Mastercard Accelerates Crypto Card Partner Program, Making it Easier for Consumers to Hold and Activate Cryptocurrencies
data.text: Wirex Becomes First Native Cryptocurrency Platform to Be Granted Principal Membership License.
